task.summary: feat(filters): Implement persistent filter settings The application now automatically saves the current filter state to the browser's localStorage. When the app is reloaded, it restores the previously used filters, providing a more seamless and personalized user experience. Files Changed: App.tsx feat(ui): Add distinct category icons to detail panel Enhanced the IncidentDetail component to display a unique icon (e.g., roadwork cone vs. car crash) in the header. This provides immediate visual context for the incident type, making it consistent with the icons already present in the main incident list. Files Changed: components/IncidentDetail.tsx docs(readme): Update documentation with latest features Updated the README.md file to include the new "Persistent UI Settings" and "Distinct Category Icons" in the Core Features list. This ensures the project documentation accurately reflects the current state of the application. Files Changed: README.md
